item.title: Version 1.9.26
item.description:
NameQuick v1.9.26

Pro Tip

ðŸ’¡ Speed up file processing: Deactivate meta description generation in settings when not needed. This can significantly reduce processing time and token usage, especially for large batches of files. Only enable it when you specifically need detailed metadata extraction.

Whatâ€™s New

BYOK Token Usage Dashboard

Track your API token consumption and costs with a new comprehensive dashboard for Bring Your Own Keys users: â€¢ Real-time token usage tracking across OpenAI, Gemini, and Ollama â€¢ Detailed cost breakdowns by model and operation type â€¢ Historical usage charts with daily/weekly/monthly views â€¢ Export usage data for expense tracking

Enhanced AI Model Support

â€¢ Added 5 new Gemini models including stable 2.5 Pro and Flash versions â€¢ Expanded Gemini catalog from 8 to 13 models total â€¢ Better model recommendations based on file type and tier preference

Whatâ€™s Improved

Better BYOK Experience

â€¢ Real-time token usage tracking with accurate cost estimates â€¢ Enhanced API key validation that works on all network conditions â€¢ Redesigned model selector interfaces for OpenAI and Gemini â€¢ New shared components for consistent API key handling â€¢ Automatic model filtering based on API key availability

Performance & Reliability

â€¢ Parallel processing coordinator for 2-3x faster batch operations â€¢ Intelligent retry logic with exponential backoff â€¢ Circuit breaker pattern to prevent API overload â€¢ Configurable timeouts for better control â€¢ Image compression for reduced token usage on uploads â€¢ Processing metrics tracking for performance monitoring

User Interface Enhancements

â€¢ Improved transformation editor with better placeholder handling â€¢ Enhanced pattern testing with real-time preview â€¢ Better error messages with actionable recovery options â€¢ Streamlined window management and lifecycle handling â€¢ New Raycast-style tabs for settings navigation

Developer Experience

â€¢ Comprehensive async/await test suite updates â€¢ Strategy pattern for flexible processing workflows â€¢ Centralized error handling with recovery mechanisms â€¢ Better separation of concerns in processing pipeline â€¢ Enhanced logging with structured token usage data
